page.title: San Diego Film Critics Society Awards 2009

revisions.rev:
''' 14th SDFCS Awards '''
15 December 2009
----
Best Film:
''' Inglourious Basterds '''
The '''14th San Diego Film Critics Society Awards''' were announced on December 15, 2009.{{cite web| url=http://theawardspsychic.blogspot.com/2009/12/san-diego-film-critics-society.html| title=San Diego Film Critics Society | publisher=theawardspsychic.blogspot.com}} {{cite web| url=http://sdfcs.org/2009-awards/| title=2009 Awards | publisher=sdfcs.org}} ==Nominees== ===Best Actor=== '''[[Colin Firth]]''' – '''''[[A Single Man]]''''' *[[George Clooney]] – ''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' *[[Matt Damon]] – ''[[The Informant!]]'' *[[Ben Foster (actor)|Ben Foster]] – ''[[The Messenger (2009 film)|The Messenger]]'' *[[Christian McKay]] – ''[[Me and Orson Welles]]'' *[[Viggo Mortenson]] – ''[[The Road (2009 film)|The Road]]'' *[[Jeremy Renner]] – ''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' ===Best Actress=== '''[[Michelle Monaghan]]''' – '''''[[Trucker (film)|Trucker]]''''' *[[Sandra Bullock]] – ''[[The Blind Side]]'' *[[Abbie Cornish]] – ''[[Bright Star (film)|Bright Star]]'' *[[Carey Mulligan]] – ''[[An Education]]'' *[[Meryl Streep]] – ''[[Julie & Julia]]'' ===Best Animated Film=== '''''[[Up (2009 film)|Up]]''''' *''[[9 (2009 film)|9]]'' *''[[Coraline (film)|Coraline]]'' *''[[Fantastic Mr. Fox (film)|Fantastic Mr. Fox]]'' *''[[Monsters vs. Aliens]]'' ===Best Cinematography=== '''''[[The Road (2009 film)|The Road]]''''' – '''[[Javier Aguirresarobe]]''' *''[[Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (film)|Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince]]'' – [[Bruno Delbonnel]] *''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' – [[Barry Ackroyd]] *''[[Inglourious Basterds]]'' – [[Robert Richardson (cinematographer)|Robert Richardson]] *''[[A Single Man]]'' – Eduard Grau *''[[The Young Victoria]]'' – Hagen Bogdanski ===Best Director=== '''[[Quentin Tarantino]]''' – '''''[[Inglourious Basterds]]''''' *[[Kathryn Bigelow]] – ''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' *[[James Cameron]] – ''[[Avatar (2009 film)|Avatar]]'' *[[Coen Brothers|Joel Coen and Ethan Coen]] – ''[[A Serious Man]]'' *[[Tom Ford]] – ''[[A Single Man]]'' *[[Jason Reitman]] – ''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' ===Best Documentary=== '''''[[The Cove (film)|The Cove]]''''' *''[[Anvil! The Story of Anvil]]'' *''[[Capitalism: A Love Story]]'' *''[[Food, Inc.]]'' *''[[Valentino: The Last Emperor]]'' ===Best Editing=== '''''[[(500) Days of Summer]]''''' – '''Alan Edward Bell''' *''[[District 9]]'' – [[Julian Clarke]] *''[[Inglourious Basterds]]'' – [[Sally Menke]] *''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' – [[Bob Murawski]] *''[[Zombieland]]'' – Peter Amundson and Alan Baumgarten ===Best Ensemble Performance=== '''''[[Inglourious Basterds]]'' *''[[Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (film)|Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince]]'' *''[[In the Loop (film)|In the Loop]]'' *''[[The Messenger (2009 film)|The Messenger]]'' *''[[A Serious Man]]'' *''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' *''[[Zombieland]]'' ===Best Film=== '''''[[Inglourious Basterds]]'' *''[[(500) Days of Summer]]'' *''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' *''[[A Single Man]]'' *''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' ===Best Foreign Language Film=== '''''[[Il divo (film)|Il Divo]]''''' â¢ [[Italy]] *''[[Amreeka]]'' â¢ [[USA]]/[[Canada]] *''[[Captain Abu Raed]]'' â¢ [[Jordan]] *''[[The Lemon Tree|The Lemon Tree (Etz Limon)]]'' â¢ [[Israel]]/[[Germany]]/[[France]] *''[[Red Cliff (film)|Red Cliff (Chi bi)]]'' â¢ [[China]] *''[[Sin Nombre (2009 film)|Sin Nombre]]'' â¢ [[Spain]] *''[[The Stoning of Soraya M.]]'' â¢ [[USA]] *''[[Thirst (2009 film)|Thirst (Bakjwi)]]'' â¢ [[South Korea]] *''[[Treeless Mountain]]'' â¢ [[South Korea]] ===Best Production Design=== '''''[[Inglourious Basterds]]''''' – '''[[David Wasco]]''' *''[[Avatar (2009 film)|Avatar]]'' – [[Rick Carter]] and Robert Stromberg *''[[Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (film)|Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince]]'' – [[Stuart Craig]] *''[[The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus]]'' – [[Anastasia Masaro]] *''[[Me and Orson Welles]]'' – Laurence Dorman *''[[A Single Man]]'' – Dan Bishop *''[[Where the Wild Things Are (film)|Where the Wild Things Are]]'' – [[K.K. Barrett]] ===Best Score=== '''''[[A Single Man]]''''' – '''[[Abel Korzeniowski]]''' *''[[(500) Days of Summer]]'' – [[Mychael Danna]] and Rob Simonsen *''[[Fantastic Mr. Fox (film)|Fantastic Mr. Fox]]'' – [[Alexandre Desplat]] *''[[Up (2009 film)|Up]]'' – [[Michael Giacchino]] *''[[Where the Wild Things Are (film)|Where the Wild Things Are]]'' – [[Carter Burwell]] and [[Karen O]] *''[[The Young Victoria]]'' – [[Ilan Eshkeri]] ===Best Original Screenplay=== '''''[[Inglourious Basterds]]''''' – '''[[Quentin Tarantino]]''' *''[[(500) Days of Summer]]'' – [[Scott Neustadter]] and [[Michael H. Weber]] *''[[The Messenger (2009 film)|The Messenger]]'' – Alessandro Camon and [[Oren Moverman]] *''[[A Serious Man]]'' – [[Coen Brothers|Joel Coen and Ethan Coen]] *''[[Up (2009 film)|Up]]'' – [[Bob Peterson (animator)|Bob Peterson]] and [[Pete Docter]] ===Best Adapted Screenplay=== '''''[[Fantastic Mr. Fox (film)|Fantastic Mr. Fox]]''''' – '''[[Wes Anderson]] and [[Noah Baumbach]]''' *''[[The Informant!]]'' – [[Scott Z. Burns]] *''[[Julie & Julia]]'' – [[Nora Ephron]] *''[[A Single Man]]'' – [[Tom Ford]] and [[David Scearce]] *''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' – [[Jason Reitman]] and [[Sheldon Turner]] ===Best Supporting Actor=== '''[[Christoph Waltz]]''' – '''''[[Inglourious Basterds]]''''' *[[Woody Harrelson]] – ''[[The Messenger (2009 film)|The Messenger]]'' *[[John Malkovich]] – ''[[The Great Buck Howard]]'' *[[Paul Schneider (actor)|Paul Schneider]] – ''[[Bright Star (film)|Bright Star]]'' *[[Stanley Tucci]] – ''[[The Lovely Bones (film)|The Lovely Bones]]'' ===Best Supporting Actress=== '''[[Samantha Morton]]''' – '''''[[The Messenger (2009 film)|The Messenger]]''''' *[[Vera Farmiga]] – ''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' *[[Anna Kendrick]] – ''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]'' *[[MÃ©lanie Laurent]] – ''[[Inglourious Basterds]]'' *[[Mo'Nique]] – ''[[Precious (film)|Precious]]'' ===Body of Work=== *[[Woody Harrelson]] – ''[[The Messenger (2009 film)|The Messenger]]'', ''[[Zombieland]]'' and ''[[2012 (film)|2012]]'' ==References== {{Reflist}} {{SDFCS Awards Chron}} [[Category:San Diego Film Critics Society Awards|2]] [[Category:2009 film awards]] [[ja:ç¬¬14åãµã³ãã£ã¨ã´æ ç»æ¹è©å®¶åä¼è³]]
